short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension make it easily that you change your language setting on JIRA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension make it easily that you change your language setting on JIRA.

Note: This extension works on all Atlassian supported JIRA.
